official_title: A bill to direct the Department of the Interior to conduct certain studies related to the Muddy Creek special water quality project.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to conduct a hydrology study and a feasibility grade surge relief study in relation to soil erosion and natural resource problems in the Muddy Creek Basin, Montana. Requires the Secretary to report to Congress on such studies. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Department of the Interior to conduct certain studies related to the Muddy Creek special water quality project.
